segments.text: I see the woman is so focused on drying that plate, it's like she's in her own world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pouring out of the sink, and she doesn't even seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she must be really tired or something to not see the mess around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being so sneaky, and I can't believe how brave they are.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching so far, and the girl is just waiting for her cookie like it's no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get away with it, it's kind of exciting to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is wobbling, and I'm getting nervous just looking at it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they've done this before, sneaking cookies when the woman isn't looking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is making such a mess, but it's also kind of beautiful how it's streaming down the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think this scene is so interesting, with so much happening at once.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't wait to see what happens next, it's like a little story unfolding before my eyes.
segments.speaker: PAR
